name: try-aura
description: an AI-powered virtual try-on and content creation platform built for fashion and eCommerce.

scripts.makepot: wp i18n make-pot --domain='try-aura' --include='build,inc,lib,templates,try-aura.php' . --headers='{"Report-Msgid-Bugs-To":"https://dokan.co/contact/"}' --file-comment="Copyright (c) $(date +'%Y') Dokan Inc. All Rights Reserved." languages/try-aura.pot
scripts.zip: rm -rf try-aura try-aura.zip && mkdir try-aura && cp -r build inc templates vendor try-aura.php try-aura/ && zip -r try-aura.zip try-aura && rm -rf try-aura

author: WeDevs
